modName: The Sleeping Giant Inn - IC Overhaul
summary: Overhauls The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]

[size=6]The Sleeping Giant Inn - IC Overhaul[/size]

[line]

"The Sleeping Giant Inn - IC Overhaul" is obviously an overhaul of "The Sleeping Giant Inn" in Riverwood.

I've always loved Riverwood and felt "The Sleeping Giant Inn" was a bit bland and dull so I made an attempt to fill it with more things and make it a bit more appealing to the eye. I've added things like a new wooden plank floor so no more stone floor, many plants and ivy around the place for a bit of colour, lots of clutter items to fill the place and make it look more "full", added bar stools to the bar so you can sit and drink at the bar, more sun beams coming in from the windows during the day and a few things have been moved around, changed and added. It is fully navmeshed so followers can still move around smoothly inside.

Only requires the latest Skyrim update.

Feel free to upload your pictures of it because I'm not using an ENB so there is probably many people out there who could give it more justice than my pictures.

[line]

[size=6]Slideshow[/size]

[line]

[youtube]jqhPpZ5i-vI[/youtube]

[line]

[size=6]Installation[/size]

[line]

Use NMM for easy install or just put the meshes folder and the esp into your skyrim data folder.

Remember to activate the esp in your launcher or mod manager of choice.

[line]

[size=6]Uninstallation[/size]

[line]

If you have installed using NMM then simply deactivate the mod or if you installed manually then delete the esp.

[line][/center]
author: IC - IconicCreations
